LIVING ROOM

General Floor Cleaning:
Dilute 2 tablespoons (1 fl oz) in 1 gallon of water for everyday cleaning. Enjoy a pleasant aroma and a lasting shine on your floors.

Kitchen & Bathroom Cleaning:
Dilute ½ cup (4 fl oz) per gallon of water. Clean surfaces with a sponge, then rinse. Leaves behind a fresh aroma and zero residue on sinks, shower doors, and countertops.

Toilet Bowls:
Dilute ½ cup (4 fl oz) in ½ gallon of water. Add to the toilet bowl and brush thoroughly. Leaves your toilet fresh and clean with a pleasant scent.

For Extra Aroma & Tough Stains:
Pour the product full-strength directly onto hard, non-porous surfaces. Rinse with a wet mop or sponge for deep cleaning and a long-lasting aroma.

QUICK AND EASY APPLICATION

Spray
Hold the bottle about 6-8 inches away from the surface and spray evenly.

Wipe
Use a clean cloth or sponge to wipe away dirt and grime.

Rinse if Necessary
For areas like kitchen counters or food preparation surfaces, rinse with water after wiping to ensure all cleaner residue is removed.
Ideal for many surfaces.

PERFECT FOR VARIOUS SURFACES

Kitchen
Spray on countertops, stovetops, and cabinets to remove grease and food residues.

Bathroom
Use on tiles, sinks, and toilet areas to eliminate soap scum, dirt, and odors.

Living Areas
Freshen up surfaces like tables, shelves, and floors with a quick spray and wipe.

Outdoor Furniture
Clean and deodorize metal and plastic outdoor furniture to keep them looking new.

PINALEN® Glass & Surface Cleaner Fresh Scent offers powerful cleaning without the harsh ammonia smell. Discover the benefits that make it the perfect choice for all your glass and surface cleaning needs:

Ammonia-Free Fresh Scent

  • Offers a fresh scent with an ammonia-free formula for a pleasant cleaning experience.
  • Leaves no residues, ensuring surfaces are safe and clean.

Quick-Drying, Streak-Free Shine

  • Dries quickly, leaving surfaces with a streak-free shine.
  • Provides a spotless finish on glass, mirrors, and home appliances.

Removes Grease & Stains

  • Effectively removes grease and tough stains for a spotless surface.
  • Safe to use on a variety of surfaces, including home appliances.

SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE APPLICATION

  • Spray
    Hold the bottle about 6-8 inches from the surface and spray evenly.
  • Wipe
    Use a clean, dry cloth or paper towel to wipe away the cleaner.
  • Admire
    Enjoy the streak-free, gleaming results

PERFECT FOR VARIOUS SURFACES

  • Kitchen
    Spray on countertops, stovetops, and cabinets to remove grease and food residues.
  • Bathroom
    Use on tiles, sinks, and toilet areas to eliminate soap scum, dirt, and odors.
  • Living Areas
    Freshen up surfaces like tables, shelves, and floors with a quick spray and wipe.
  • Outdoor Furniture
    Clean and deodorize metal and plastic outdoor furniture to keep them looking new.

Cut Through Grease with Citrus Power

PINALEN® Professional Multipurpose Cleaner Heavy-Duty Citrus Degreaser is your ultimate solution for tackling tough cleaning challenges. Combining the strength of pine oil with a refreshing citrus scent, this powerful cleaner makes degreasing easier and more effective than ever. Explore the key benefits that set PINALEN® apart.

Unmatched Degreasing Power

  • Heavy-duty formula that attacks grease, grime, and oil for a thorough clean.
  • Cuts through grease effortlessly, leaving less residue than the leading pine cleaner brand.
  • Dries faster than PINALEN® Max Aromas Multipurpose Cleaner, ensuring quick and effective cleaning.

Refreshing Citrus Scent

  • Deodorizes surfaces with a long-lasting, refreshing citrus scent.

Versatile Application

  • Works in pump sprayers, making it easy to apply on various surfaces for all your cleaning needs.

CITRUS
172 fl oz, 16.9 fl oz
SDS

Experience the invigorating citrus scent of PINALEN® Professional Multipurpose Cleaner Heavy-Duty Citrus Degreaser. This refreshing aroma not only enhances your cleaning routine but also leaves your spaces smelling crisp and clean long after the job is done.

SHOP NOW

Easy and Effective Application

  • Prepare the Solution:
    For optimal results, use the recommended dilution ratio. For heavy-duty cleaning, use the degreaser undiluted or mix with water as needed.
  • Apply:
    Fill a pump sprayer with the prepared solution and apply generously to the greasy or dirty surface.
  • Scrub:
    Use a brush or cloth to scrub the surface, ensuring the degreaser penetrates and breaks down the grease and grime.
  • Rinse:
    Rinse the surface thoroughly with water to remove any residue.
  • Enjoy:
    Appreciate the sparkling clean surface and the lingering fresh citrus scent.

Perfect for Various Surfaces

  • Kitchen:
    Clean stovetops, ovens, and countertops with ease.
  • Garage:
    Tackle greasy tools, engines, and workspaces.
  • Outdoors:
    Remove grime from grills, patio furniture, and driveways.

Multi-Purpose Power with Real Pine Oil

Discover PINALEN® Professional Multipurpose Cleaner. Perfect for home, office, and commercial use, it offers 180 uses as a powerful degreaser, deep cleaner, and deodorizer in Pine, Floral, Lavender, and Lemon scents.

SHOP NOW
PINALEN® Professional Multipurpose Cleaner is your ultimate solution for professional-grade cleaning. With the strength of pine oil and a versatile formula, it’s perfect for a wide range of cleaning tasks. Explore the key benefits that set PINALEN® Professional Multipurpose Cleaner apart:

Professional Cleaner

  • Formulated for commercial and home use, delivering professional-grade results.
  • Compatible with HE washers, making it an excellent addition to laundry routines.
  • Works with pump sprayers for easy application on large surfaces.

150+ Proven Uses

  • Offers 30% more uses than the previous version when following the general floor cleaning directions.
  • Naturally derived formula containing natural pine oil for versatile, multi-surface cleaning.

Powerful Degreaser

  • Tackles tough grease and grime with ease, thanks to its 30% more pine oil content compared to the previous formula.
  • Removes stubborn stains, including grease and pen ink, with more stain removal power at full strength.

Deep Cleans and Deodorizes

  • Deep cleans various surfaces, leaving them spotless and fresh.
  • Deodorizes effectively, providing a long-lasting, pleasant aroma.

Floors & General Cleaning:

  • Dilute 4 fl oz of product in 5L of water and mop.
  • For hard-to-remove stains or stuck-on grease, use undiluted on the soiled surface, let it stand for a few minutes, scrub, and rinse with water.

Laundry

Add 8 fl oz per large load directly into the washing machine to boost detergent.

Tough on Grease, Gentle on Skin

Transform your dishwashing with PINALEN® Dishwashing Liquid Multipurpose Cleaner. Tough on grease yet gentle on the skin, it removes stuck-on food and bad odors. Available in Cucumber Crush, Apple Pop, and Citrus Glow.

SHOP NOW
PINALEN® Dishwashing Liquid Multipurpose Cleaner transforms dish duty into an effortless, pleasant experience. With its powerful cleaning action and delightful scents, it’s the perfect solution for all your dishwashing needs.

Deep Cleans

  • Active formula that leaves dishes sparkling clean.
  • Removes stuck-on food and food residues with ease.
  • Biodegradable formula for an eco-friendly clean.

Eliminates Bad Odors

  • Features Acti-Sense® Fragrance to ensure dishes have a fresh, pleasant scent after every wash.
  • Powerful foam action fights odors, leaving dishes smelling clean.

Cuts Grease

  • Tough on grease with 100% effectiveness on food greases.
  • One squeeze tackles up to 9 dishes, providing a powerful, grease-fighting clean that is safe for sensitive skin.

Effortless and Effective Dishwashing

Dispense:
Squeeze a small amount of PINALEN® Dishwashing Liquid onto a sponge or directly into your sink filled with warm water.

Wash:
Scrub your dishes, pots, and pans to remove food particles, grease, and grime. The powerful formula works quickly to break down tough residues.

Rinse:
Thoroughly rinse your dishes with clean water to ensure all soap residue is removed, leaving your dishes sparkling clean.

Enjoy:
Revel in the fresh, delightful scents of Cucumber Crush, Apple Pop, or Citrus Glow as you admire your clean, grease-free dishes.
